name: The Way of Yiji
description:
SCHIZOID BAND presents:
THE WAY OF YIJI

SIDE A track 3

Album INITIATION

2014

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

The Way of Yiji focus the exploration and contemplation of its visual and sound environment. You are a samurai, that after an attack on your village and the death of your beloved, must carry your child, Yiji, to the Temple of the Lively Light. Poisoned by an arrow, the samurai will die. The game is an immersion in the teachings of Light. The only enemy is time itself.

The Way of Yiji game - FREE
